text: jyare ke tame najikana kinara para hata ane te'o durana kinare hata ane laskaro tamara karata nicala bhagamam hata, jo tame andara'andara vacana karata to, ni:Sanka tame nakki karela samaya para pahoncavamam moda padi jatam, parantu allahane to eka karya kari ja nankhavanum hatum, je nakki tha'i gayum hatum, jethi je nasta thaya te purava sathe thaya, ane je jivita rahe te (satyane parakhine) purava sathe jivita rahe, ni:Sanka allaha ghano ja sambhalanara, khuba janavavalo che
